data.eml:eml: Cryptic species within cryptic moths: new species of Dunama Schaus (Notodontidae, Nystaleinae) in Costa Rica

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chacon, Isidro A., Janzen, Daniel H., Hallwachs, Winnie, J. Bolling Sullivan,, Hajibabaei, Mehrdad (2013): Cryptic species within cryptic moths: new species of Dunama Schaus (Notodontidae, Nystaleinae) in Costa Rica. ZooKeys 264: 11-45, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.264.4440, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.264.4440
